meanings.definition: Members of an academic community or institution.
meanings.sent1: The academicians gathered for a conference at the university.
meanings.sent2: The group of academicians published a research paper together.
meanings.sent3: The academicians had a friendly debate about the best teaching methods.
meanings.sent4: In the world of academia, academicians are like the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The young student aspired to become one of the respected academicians in the future.

meanings.definition: Scholars or experts in a particular field of study.
meanings.sent1: The renowned academicians were invited to speak at the prestigious conference.
meanings.sent2: Academicians in the field of history often conduct in-depth research.
meanings.sent3: The academicians shared fascinating stories from their research trips.
meanings.sent4: The academicians' knowledge was as vast as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The academicians' passion for learning inspired their students to excel.
